page.title: 10Recreation.
page.content: The area is rich in recreational possibilies.The River Wye provides facilities for canoeing.There is an annual raft race down the river for charity.The River Wye provides excellent trout and salmon fishing but our stretch is privatly owned. There is an Annual Sports Day on the Maesllwch Estate for the local children. Authorities from England have bought houses in the area and use them as outward bound centres eg.Ty Carreg. Children can often be seen using the area for orienteering. Fox hunting still takes place in the area. The Radnor Arms,Llowes has been a drinking house for 1,000 years and still provides excellent food and drink for the traveller.
